description:
An advanced API testing utility.

Built for developers and testers alike, SoapUI is the only open source tool that covers the entire testing spectrum (functional, security, load, mocking). With its easy-to-use graphical interface, SoapUI is the entry point for API testing so you can validate REST & SOAP-based web services with ease.
- Updated the Opt-in to Stay Tuned invite
- Added AES256 project encryption support
- Updated Java to v17.0.12
- Updated JavaFX to v17.0.12
- Upgrade Groovy to 3.0.8
- Update com.graphql-java:graphql-java in SoapUI to 17.4.0
- MacOS (ARM 64 bit) installer available with 5.8.0
- Made some styling updates to Endpoint Explorer after upgrade to Java 17
